about_the_game:
Your titanic stature as a progenitor of the Project Genesis development efforts will be secured with the TITANIUM PACK. Receive the Titanium animated Emblem, Titanium animated Kill Card Banner, Titanium skins for the eight currently available battle craft, Founders Pack Color Palette, the release of the Project Genesis Remastered Original Soundtrack in the FUTURE, the Roger's Roughnecks unique battle craft skin in the FUTURE, and a FUTURE allocation of 1999 Credits.

Items in the Titanium Founders Pack include:

  • Titanium Animated Emblem
  • Titanium Animated Banner
  • Titanium battle craft Skin
  • Founders Pack Color Palette
  • Remastered OST (future release)
  • Founders battle craft Skin (Roger’s Roughnecks - future release)
  • 1999 Bonus Credits (future release)

*If you're already an owner of this pack and don't see your items in-game, please re-link Steam to your account profile on and login again into the game to receive your items. Contact us with any further issues.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 equivalent DX11 GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: You aren’t content with blending in; you need to stand out. Set yourself apart with the Titanium Founders Pack and show your support for Project Genesis as a Founder!
